item.title: Weâ€™re accepting submissions!
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: Yes because I'm still not busy enough, Brain Scan Studios is now accepting submissions for original comic book projects. We're willing to consider all genres, black-and-white or color. Email brian.kirsten.bss@gmail.com for more information.
item.excerpt:encoded: Yes because I'm still not busy enough, Brain Scan Studios is now accepting submissions for original comic book projects. We're willing to consider all genres, black-and-white or color. Email brian.kirsten.bss@gmail.com for more information.
